HTML5 - Forms - About Validation

  • To disable the default validation behavior, use the novalidate attribute on the form element
  • Specify a mandatory field by using the required
<ul class="horizontal-split"> <li> <form novalidate> <input type="url" /> <input type="submit" /> </form> </li> <li> <form> <input type="url" required /> <input type="submit" /> </form> </li> </ul>
